channel.title: Music and Sound Design
channel.description: Recent content on Music and Sound Design

item.title: Yandex Qatar - Music & Sound Design
item.description: Created a short intro video with phygital.team for Yandex presentation. Crafted a sound design blending modern composition with Eastern musical elements to highlight innovation and cultural depth.

item.title: Roger Gallet - Sound Design
item.description: Collaboration with Clim Studio. Created detailed sound design for product presentation, featuring delicate bottle textures, dynamic transitions, and subtle ambient elements that enhance the product’s aesthetic.

item.title: Mr Porter - Sound Design
item.description: Collaboration with Clim Studio. Created a winter-themed sound design for Mr Porter’s seasonal campaign, featuring crisp snow textures and atmospheric elements that enhance the winter aesthetic.

item.title: Aurora - Music & Sound Design
item.description: Created original music and sound design for Aurora BR-X keyboard presentation. Developed a technical yet light sound palette that emphasizes innovation and precision.

item.title: Yandex - Music & Sound Design
item.description: Created music and sound design for Yandex Practicum service. Developed a technical, light, and bright sound palette that reflects the educational platform’s innovative approach.

item.title: Mr Porter - Sound Design
item.description: Part of the Mr Porter series. Created space-themed sound effects that enhance the cosmic atmosphere, featuring ethereal textures and dynamic transitions.

item.title: Mr Porter - Sound Design
item.description: Another installment in the Mr Porter series. Created airy sound effects that convey lightness and space, enhancing the visual narrative through subtle sonic elements.

item.title: Roger Gallet - Sound Design
item.description: Continuation of the Roger Gallet series. Enhanced the product presentation with refined sound design elements that maintain brand consistency while introducing new sonic textures.

item.title: Alternative client for Splice
item.description: Personally, I have a weird relationship with Splice. Sure, it's cool to have a tool that speeds up your workflow like that. But in the end, we still end up stuck in some kind of template, reusing the same one-shots over and over. That's why, over the years, I've accumulated a ridiculous number of unused credits. Buying entire sample packs just doesn't seem worth it to me. Using melodic samples from Splice, in my opinion, is straight-up insane.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Let's Create Something Amazing Together! I'm always excited to take on new and interesting projects. Whether you have a specific idea in mind or just want to explore possibilities, we'd love to hear from you. hihi@divosound.com @httpdivo @divo.divo.divo
